title: 前 言
paragraphs: 《三体》终于能与科幻朋友们见面了，用连载的方式事先谁都没有想到，也是无奈之举。之前就题材问题与编辑们仔细商讨过，感觉没有什么问题，但没想到今年是文革三十周年这事儿，单行本一时出不了，也只能这样了。
其实这本书不是文革题材的，文革内容在其中只占不到十分之一，但却是一个漂荡在故事中挥之不去的精神幽灵。
本书虽不是《球状闪电》的续集，但可以看做那个故事所发生的世界在其后的延续，那个物理学家在故事中出现但已不重要，其他的人则永远消失了，林云真的死了，虽然我有时在想，如果她活下来，最后是不是这个主人公的样子？
这是一个暂名为《地球往事》的系列的第一部，可以看做一个更长的故事的开始。
这是一个关于背叛的故事，也是一个生存与死亡的故事，有时候，比起生存还是死亡来，忠诚与背叛可能更是一个问题。
疯狂与偏执，最终将在人类文明的内部异化出怎样的力量？冷酷的星空将如何拷问心中道德？
作者试图讲述一部在光年尺度上重新演绎的中国现代史，讲述一个文明二百次毁灭与重生的传奇。
朋友们将会看到，连载的这第一期，几乎不是科幻，但这本书并不是这一期显示出来的这个样子，它不是现实科幻，比《球状闪电》更空灵，希望您能耐心地看下去，后面的故事变化会很大。
在以后的一段时光中，读者朋友们将走过我在过去的一年中走过的精神历程，坦率地说，我不知道你们将在这条黑暗诡异的迷途上看到什么，我很不安。但科幻写到今天，能够与大家同行这么长一段时间，也是缘份。

translated_paragraphs: "The Three-Body Problem" is finally able to meet its science fiction friends. It was a无奈 decision to use serialization, as no one had expected it. Before, we had carefully discussed the topic with the editors, and we felt that there were no problems. However, we never expected that this year would be the 30th anniversary of the Cultural Revolution, and a single-volume edition would not be able to come out. This is the only way out."

In fact, this book is not about the Cultural Revolution, and the content of the Cultural Revolution only accounts for less than one-tenth of the book. However, it is a spiritual specter that lingers throughout the story.

Although this book is not a sequel to The Lightning Rod, it can be seen as a continuation of the world in which the story takes place, and the physicist who appears in the story is no longer important, while the other people have disappeared forever. Lin Yun really died, although sometimes I wonder, if she had survived, would she have ended up like the protagonist?
This is the first installment of a series titled 'Remnants of Earth', which can be seen as the beginning of a longer story.
This is a story about betrayal, a story about survival and death. Sometimes, between survival and death, loyalty and betrayal may be a bigger problem.
What kind of power will madness and obsession ultimately produce within human civilization? How will the cold stars question one's inner morality?
The author attempts to retell modern Chinese history on a scale of light-years, and a legendary tale of a civilization that has been destroyed and reborn 200 times.

"My friends will see that this first serial is almost not science fiction, but this book is not this way this issue appears. It is not real science fiction, more ethereal than "Rim of the Ice", and I hope you can be patient and read on. The stories will change greatly from here on out."

In the following period of time, readers will walk through the spiritual journey that I have walked through in the past year. To be honest, I don't know what you will see on this dark and strange path, and I'm very uneasy. But science fiction has come so far that it's a缘分 for us to walk together for such a long time.
en_translation_baichuan2_7b: "The Three-Body Problem" is finally meeting with science fiction friends. Through serialization, no one thought of it in advance and it was also a desperate measure. We had carefully discussed the theme with editors before, and felt that there were no problems, but we didn't expect this year to be the 30th anniversary of the Cultural Revolution. The single-volume edition cannot be published at once, and this is also the only way.

In fact, this book is not about the Cultural Revolution, and the Cultural Revolution content only accounts for less than one-tenth of it, but it is a spiritual ghost that cannot be eliminated from the story.

Although this book is not a sequel to "The Ball Lightning," it can be seen as the continuation of the world in that story, and the physicist appears in it, but he is no longer important. The others have forever disappeared, and Lin Yun really died. Although I sometimes think, if she had survived, would she have looked like the protagonist in the end?
This is the first part of a series entitled "The Past of Earth," which can be seen as the beginning of a longer story.
This is a story about betrayal and survival or death. Sometimes, loyalty and betrayal may be more of a question than survival or death.
Crazy and obsessive, what kind of power will be internalized in human civilization? How will the cold starry sky examine the moral in one's heart?
The author attempts to retell a modern history of China reinterpreted on a light-year scale, telling a legend of a civilization's 200 times of destruction and resurrection.

Friends will see that this first installment is almost not science fiction, but this book is not what it shows in this issue. It's not realistic science fiction. It's more ethereal than "Ball Lightning". I hope you can patiently read it. The story will change a lot later on.

In the coming period of time, readers will walk through the spiritual journey I have traveled in the past year. To be honest, I don't know what you will see on this dark and eerie path. I am very uneasy. However, science fiction has reached this point, and it is also a fate to be able to accompany you for such a long time.
cn_summaries_baichuan2_7b: 《三体》以连载形式与读者见面，因文革三十周年影响导致单行本出版延迟。
这段描述了一本书中的文革主题虽然只占很少部分，却成为故事中无法摆脱的精神困扰。
这段文字描述了一本非《球状闪电》续集的书，讲述了故事世界的发展以及一名物理学家角色的变化。同时，提到了林云角色的死亡，以及作者对如果林云存活下来可能成为主人公的看法。
这段描述了一个名为《地球往事》的科幻系列第一部的开始，作为更长故事的开端。
本段讲述了背叛和生存死亡的故事，强调了忠诚与背叛在关键时刻的重要性。
这段文字探讨了疯狂和偏执可能导致人类文明内部的异化，以及星际寒冷如何考验人类的道德观念。
作者构思了一部光年尺度的中国现代史重构，展现了一个文明历经200次毁灭与重生之传奇。
这段文字描述了连载的第一期并非典型的科幻小说，但随后的章节将呈现更多丰富的内容和变化。
在接下来的时光里，读者们将与作者共同探索过去一年中的精神历程，尽管未知前方是否有黑暗诡异的困境。然而，科幻作品与读者们的缘份已经延续至今。
en_summaries_baichuan2_7b: "The Three-Body" novel is finally available for sci-fi fans, published in a serialized format due to unforeseen circumstances. Despite thorough discussions with editors over the topic, the publication has been delayed due to the 30th anniversary of the Cultural Revolution.
This book is not about the Cultural Revolution, and its content only accounts for less than 10% of the story. However, it is a persistent spiritual ghost that haunts the story.

This book is not a sequel to "The Ball Lightning," but can be seen as the continuation of the world mentioned in the former, focusing on the lives of some characters after their respective stories. Although the physicist from the original work has little relevance, others have disappeared forever, and the protagonist's future remains uncertain.
"The Earth's Past", a series of novels, serves as the first installment and beginning of a longer story.
This is a story of betrayal and survival, highlighting the importance of loyalty and honesty in difficult situations.
Crazy and paranoid behaviors will ultimately lead to internal divisions within human civilization, questioning the morality of the cold and unchanging universe.
The author aims to retell China's modern history on a cosmic scale, depicting the legendary tale of a civilization that has experienced 200 destructions and rebirths.

In this first installment of a series, the book is not strictly science fiction. However, it is not what it appears to be in this episode and is not realistic science fiction. It is more ethereal than "Ball Lightning" and hopes that you will read patiently as the story changes significantly in future installments.

In the coming time, readers will embark on a spiritual journey through the past year's experiences of the author, who is frankly uncertain of what they will encounter along this dark and eerie path. However, the fact that science fiction has allowed the author to share this journey for so long is a testament to their connection.
